title: What did you learn too late in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: we always used to think that we are right ,what we said that matters to us ,what others are saying that doesn’t matter to us(like lena dena hi nhi h) these thoughts usually people have i their mind . Few months ago ,something happened in my life,which i would not have ever imagined . on those days whoever came to me ,i considered all of them as my enemies,like they are not with me or they can’t feel what i feel. i was not able too understand what actually my friends are telling too me . i used to be just soo confident that i am right and you all are fool,you can’t just understand .In short my behaviour tends to be exponentially down,no emotions left ,no understanding left for my well wishers . soo what i actually learned that just try to understand people what they want us to understood although if you are in anger or u are not in that mood ,just take deep breathe close your eyes,and then talk . otherwise you will only left with one choice :REGRET

1)…..Stop giving excuses..... It's the biggest & virtuest lesson life besotted me with….. …Ohh soo.... Some years back after passing my hsc exams I decided to go for medico.... (u see, people usually decide it at the brink of Ssc) but me being me ,happen to pursue it 10+2yrs after.... & it took my other 2yrs ….In those 2yrs I faced, I won't exactly say hell and all ,but it was one of the briefest unpleasant period of my life..... Believe me I have tried to justify myself giving all excuses for my failure and also playing blame game......... But… but ..but…the ultimate.... the eventuality of whatever happened ( in dis case me losing my additional 2yrs ) has effected ME... sure somewhere my parents, friends, relatives, well wishers might have felt bad or sad but I was the ‘ full bruntbearer’. So guys if we fail.... Just accept it full on & face it full on.. again.... Bcuz success or failure.... We have to lead our life through it. 2)Stand strong You are a man of ur character, opinions, choices & thoughts..... Do not let anyone deter u from what u r unless & until it's for ur betterment or ur in the wrong…. Don't let someone else to define u... Cuz ur very much potent to do so.... Be different... Stand out.... Be proud.... Cuz u r U…..💖 Regards....
